net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd

Class SimpleTransferable

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd.SimpleTransferable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transferable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleEntityTransferable

    public class SimpleTransferable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transferable
    Returns an object of any type with a single content type. This should not be used with a large data object.
    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • getTransferData

        public java.lang.Object getTransferData(javax.mail.internet.ContentType contentType)
                                 throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: Transferable
        Get the transfer data in the given content type. The content type should be checked against Transferable.getTransferContentTypes() before calling this method.
        Specified by:
        getTransferData in interface Transferable
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type.
        Returns:
        Object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the content type is not supported, which should not happen if the content type is in the collection returned by Transferable.getTransferContentTypes().
